text: == Events == * Succession of Pope Urban II (1088-1099) * Work begins on the third and largest church at Cluny * Rebellion of 1088 against William II of England lead by Odo of Bayeux. * Mansur ibn Nasir succeeds Nasir ibn Alnas as ruler of the Hammadid dynasty * University of Bologna was founded. == Deaths == * January 6 – Berengar of Tours, French theologian * July 3 – Robert of Rhuddlan, Norman ruler of most of North Wales * Naser Khosrow, Persian theologian * William de Warenne, 1st Earl of Surrey, Norman aristocrat
